Name: Block_Quotes
Schneberg: ['Volkspark Sch\xc3\xb6neberg/Wilmersdorf is quite an attraction: extended lawns, a pond with ducks, multiple playgrounds and athletic fields - perfect for summer picnics!  The Sch\xc3\xb6neberg Town Hall was the former seat of the West Berlin municipality. It was here that John F. Kennedy gave his famous "Ich bin ein Berliner" speech to the people of Berlin. Since that day, the bell of freedom tolls at noon every day in his memory.', 'The historic "Department Store of the West\xe2\x80\x98" (or, "Kaufhaus des Westens" in German) is here. Those who don\'t know it yet, will definetely love it  -  and those who have already been there, can\xe2\x80\x98t live without it.  What Harrods is to a Londoner, the Lafayette to the Parisian, and Macy\'s to a New Yorker is what KaDeWe means to the Berliner. It\'s famous for its sheer incredible assortment of designer fashions, products, and delikatessen from all over the world - and always worth a day-trip.']

Name: Lede
Schneberg: Schneberg applauds urban sensibilities. Its wide boulevards and open air plazas give way to tidy outdoor markets, rolling park spaces, and cheeky bars and clubs that welcome a thriving gay community. Artfully plastered and mortared apartments perch atop Schnebergs provocative shops, while this neighborhoods contemporary art galleries sleek stylings counter the old-world glamor of its prominent civic buildings. Even without the glitter, Schneberg dazzles year-roundits the site of numerous public festivals and parades.

Name: Photo_Captions
Schneberg: ["Sch\xc3\xb6neberg's outdoor markets offer more than handmade goods and fresh vegetables.", 'They also offer the perfect place for a Sunday afternoon stroll.', 'A thriving LGBTQ community calls Sch\xc3\xb6neberg home.', 'Filled with quirky vintage and antique shops, Sch\xc3\xb6neberg stays stylish year round.', "True authenticity can't be fabricated.", "It's nice to hear the pops.", 'Typical pre-war Berlin buildings are interrupted by modern shaped complexes from the 50s and 60s, providing this neighborhood with its delightfully off-kilter appeal.', "Sch\xc3\xb6neberg's overground subway stations give visitors a glimpse into a true Berlin commute.", 'Use U-Bahn.']
